import { Button, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useContext, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { EmployeeContext } from "../contexts/EmployeeContext"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const EmployeeList = () => { const { employees } = useContext(EmployeeContext); const { deleteEmployee } = useContext(EmployeeContext) const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); useEffect(() => { handleClose() }, [employees]) return ( <>
{ employees.map((employee, index) => ( )) }
ID Name Email Address Gender About Image Actions
{index + 1} {employee.name} {employee.age} {employee.address} {employee.gender} {employee.about}
) } export default EmployeeList;
